title: Skills
content:

navigation
, 
search
Skills
 are used in SmartSimple's 
Applicant Tracking System
 to track the skill sets of job 
applicants
. 
Measures
 can be associated with skills.
See also

Adding Applicant Profile Details and Skills

Adding Job Skills
Skill Settings
 (for a 
UTA
)
